articles.description: IU Health nurse Cassie Ban cared for coronavirus patients back in the spring and is once more on a COVID-19 unit. But this time is different.
articles.content:
Cassie Ban met her first COVID-19 patients before area hospitals had established special units to treat those battling the new disease.
As an IU Health nurse who works at Methodist, University, and … [+3917 chars]

articles.description: Google rolled out Android 11 with much fanfare earlier this year. In addition to major improvements for the mobile experience, the new version also brings a series of goodies for Android Auto users too.
articles.content: For example, beginning with this OS version, Android Auto supports the wireless mode regardless of the phone model, as this feature previously required a Samsung or Pixel device.But as some users who… [+1582 chars]
